003
004package main;
005
006import mkt.Quotes;
007import mkt.Model;
008import mkt.Models;
009import mkt.Strategy;
010import mkt.StGroupRs;
011import kut.Tp3;
012import extDb.QuotesDb;
013import data.SimParams;
014
015/** Update data */
016public class Updater {
017  private Updater(){};
018
019  /** Update data. */
020  public static void run () {
021    Quotes qts = QuotesDb.read();
022    for (Model md : Models.list()) {
023      String date = qts.dates[qts.dates.length - 1];
024      String mdId = md.id;
025      Tp3<int[], int[], int[]> PrAcRf =
026        md.paramTypes.length == 1 ? calc1(md, qts) : calc2(md, qts);
027      int[] prices = PrAcRf.e1;
028      int[] accs = PrAcRf.e2;
029      int[] refs = PrAcRf.e3;
030      Db.update(mdId, date, prices, accs, refs);
031    }
032  }
033
034// Calculates pices and references.
035// Returns [prices, accounting, references] each with as many elements as
036//    Params has.
037// \<model>, <quotes>, [[f.].] -> [[i.], [i.], [i.]]
038  static Tp3<int[], int[], int[]> calc (
039    Model md, Quotes qts, double[][] params
040  ) {
041    int len = params.length;
042    StGroupRs stRs = Strategy.stGroup(md, qts, params);
043    int[] prices = new int[len];
044    int[] accs = new int[len];
045    int[] refs = new int[len];
046
047    int[] sales = stRs.sales;
048    double[] assets = stRs.assets;
049    double[] acAssets = stRs.accs;
050    double[] rfAssets = stRs.rfAssets;
051    for (int i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
052      if (sales[i] < Cts.minSales) { // Remove lower number of sales.
053        prices[i] = -1;
054        accs[i] = -1;
055        refs[i] = -1;
056      } else {
057        prices[i] = (int)assets[i];
058        accs[i] = (int)acAssets[i];
059        refs[i] = (int)rfAssets[i];
060      }
061    }
062
063    return new Tp3<>(prices, accs, refs);
064  };
065
066
067  // Calculates pices and references of model with 1 parameter.
068  // Returns Tp3<prices, accounting, references> each one with cts.simulationSteps
069  //    elements.
070  static Tp3<int[], int[], int[]> calc1 (Model md, Quotes qts) {
071    String mdId = md.id;
072    double b = SimParams.paramBases(mdId)[0];
073    double inc = SimParams.paramIncrs(mdId)[0];
074    double [][] params = new double[Cts.simulationSteps][1];
075    for (int i = 0; i < Cts.simulationSteps; ++i)
076      params[i] = new double[]{b + inc * (double)i};
077    return calc(md, qts, params);
078  }
079
080  // Calculates pices and references of model with 2 parameters.
081  // Returns [prices, accounting, references] each one with
082  //    cts.simulationSteps x cts.simulationSteps elements.
083  static Tp3<int[], int[], int[]> calc2 (Model md, Quotes qts) {
084    String mdId = md.id;
085    double b0 = SimParams.paramBases(mdId)[0];
086    double b1 = SimParams.paramBases(mdId)[1];
087    double inc0 = SimParams.paramIncrs(mdId)[0];
088    double inc1 = SimParams.paramIncrs(mdId)[1];
089
090    double[][] params = new double[Cts.simulationSteps * Cts.simulationSteps][2];
091    int i = 0;
092    for (int r = 0; r < Cts.simulationSteps; ++r)
093      for (int c = 0; c < Cts.simulationSteps; ++c)
094        params[i++] = new double[] {
095          b0 + inc0 * (double)r, b1 + inc1 * (double)c
096        };
097
098    return calc(md, qts, params);
099  }
100}
101
